      • isInterestedIn

        public boolean isInterestedIn(java.lang.String tag)
        Specified by:
        isInterestedIn in class JMXNotificationProgressListener
        Parameters:
        tag - tag name to be checked
        Returns:
        true if given tag for ProgressEvent is a target to consume. If this returns false, then ProgressListener.progress(java.lang.String, org.apache.cassandra.utils.progress.ProgressEvent) is not called for that event.
